item.title: PyCon Italy 2022
item.description: I’ve been giving a talk on Vulture at many Python Conferences for almost half a decade now. Each time, it’s a new challenge for me since I don’t reuse my slides and it always comes out quite differently, takes me new places and teaches me new things, which I like. This time, rather than focussing on Vulture specifically, I wanted to spend more time on automated code analysis in general.
